project.objective: Home of Coolâ„¢ is a novel electronic and environment-friendly limited space cooler that does not use a compressor or a chemical refrigerant. Its target markets are POS (Point of Sales) and (Point of Purchase) vending cooler suppliers for big brands of food and beverage industries. Through SME Instrument Phase 1, we are seeking finance to prepare a Feasibility Study and Business Plan to determine in-depth the feasibility, risk, viability, profitability and sustainability of this new project.
project.title: A novel environment-friendly limited space cooler for high volume food and beverage vending industries.
